title: Welcome to the robot factory!
content: As a supervisor, your task will be assemble and train robots to perform various tasks.
But before you can start, you need to go through mandatory training that will teach you how these robots work.

title: How do robots work?
content: The robots in our factory use neural networks as their brains, which helps them learn and make decisions.

A neural network is like a web of connected neurons, where the input layer takes in information, hidden layers process it by adjusting weights and applying activation functions, and the output layer makes the final decision.
By training the network, we teach the robot how to recognize patterns and improve its performance over time!

title: Your first task
